characters/armon.html.title: Armon
characters/armon.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Spirit Speak 🟥 Yes Armon is known for being a GravekeeperThey specialize in Spirits of the DeadDescended from a long line of gravekeepers for the amidonian royal family, Armon joined King Spiff's expedition as a spiritual advisor and researcher.

characters/ashley.html.title: Ashley
characters/ashley.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 No Ashley is known for being a Vault OverseerThey specialize in DyingPrisoner who was sent to the templars to curry favor.

characters/carl.html.title: Carl
characters/carl.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Brute Strength 🟥 Yes Carl is known for being a Guard CaptainThey specialize in TacticsFormer Mercenary now turned Guard Captain. An effective military leader and warrior. Has superhuman strength due to a pact with a blood demon. Hates Templars.

characters/davelore.html.title: Davelore
characters/davelore.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Internal Power 🟩 No Davelore is known for being a MysticThey specialize in Spiritual RitualsSpifftopian Templar and Spiritual leader of the colony, Davelore maintains the shrine that protects the town from corruption and allows people to be brought back to life

characters/drake.html.title: Drake
characters/drake.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Eagle Eyes 🟥 Yes Drake is known for being an Archeologist, Merchant, Con-man, Architect, Part-time FishThey specialize in Archaeologist / Con-man who came to the colonies to find powerful artifacts & to get away from disgruntled "customers". He then spent a couple millenia as different animals.

characters/jaeger.html.title: Jaeger
characters/jaeger.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 Jaeger is known for being a Hunter, LeatherworkerThey specialize in

characters/jennifer.html.title: Jennifer
characters/jennifer.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 No Jennifer is known for being an InventorThey specialize in GunsmithingGenius inventor who joined the expedition to the Dark Isles in order to make a fortune.

characters/melphizard.html.title: Melphizard
characters/melphizard.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟥 Yes Melphizard is known for being a BlacksmithThey specialize in Sprits/ArtifactsTalented blacksmith who joined the expedition after their master's death to make a name for themselves.

characters/nydid.html.title: Nydid
characters/nydid.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Iron Gut 🟩 No Nydid is known for being a Cook, Guard, StewboyThey specialize in Stews/Mushrooms/AlcoholFormer Spifftopian Templar, now runs a stew shop in a quest to explore the culinary arts

characters/ponk.html.title: Ponk
characters/ponk.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 No Ponk is known for being a Farmer, Brewer, Woodcutter, BuilderThey specialize in Alchemy

characters/sockworthy.html.title: Sockworthy
characters/sockworthy.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟥 Yes Sockworthy is known for being a GovernorThey specialize in ManagementBorn into a noble family, Sockworthy worked as Secretary and Aide for the current Mayor of Spifftopia before being appointed Governor of the colony on the Dark Isles

characters/sola.html.title: Sola
characters/sola.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟩 Sola is known for being a Druid, GuardThey specialize in Nature SpiritsRaised by witches, Sola was captured by the Amidonians, and their guardians were killed, shortly thereafter being bought and freed by Carl.

characters/stephan.html.title: Stephan
characters/stephan.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox None 🟥 Yes Stephan is known for being an Investigator, GuardThey specialize in SchizophreniaStephan escaped sevitude as an oarsman on a merchant ship by swimming to shore. After a period living alone in the woods they settled in town

characters/xena.html.title: Xena
characters/xena.html.description: Home | Player Character ListInfobox Webs 🟩 Xena is known for being a Fletcher, SmilkerThey specialize in Smilking

databases/npc-database.html.title: NPC Database
databases/npc-database.html.description: File*AllegianceSkillsStateSummaryLore1AlenfarAmidonian TemplarsTemplar LeaderHigh Templar on the Dark Isles, Alenfar oversees a wide ranging extraction operation on the Dark Isles, which has included the import of many convict labourers, including many colonists. This has made him unpopular with the Spifftopians, although his relationship with our town remains on generally amicable terms.2CreinGuardsEx-slave3Ashley SpiritHungry Spirit4CharlesCitizens5ErineCultistsDeadGrunt6CunienMerchantsCommon visitor The regular trader to the settlement, Cunien is a 7FalandarCultistsPowerful SpritA spirt so massive and powerful that we do not fully understand its proportions.8HalcawFlobfolksLeader9EleonCultistsTest Subject10GerilioEscapeesDeadWriter Gerilio recorded the events leading up to the destruction of voyager's end, and the process that led to Marcus establishing Falandar's Cult11HelenCastle StaffMaidSubject to "Amidonian Conditioning", Helen has effectively had her free will stripped and will follow orders unquestioningly. She was bought from the Merchants by Carl, and was subsequently gifted to the Governor. How she arrived on the Isles as a slave is unknown.12GutankrtAmidonian InquisitionGrand InquisitorOne of two Grand inqusitors on the Dark Isles, Gutankrt is supernaturally strong. Generally considered offputting by the colonists, they nevertheless appear to have assisted the colony by using a considerable number of lapis blocks to seal the entrance to falandar proper. Resides in the inquisition's snowy outpost, where they delight in torture and stabbing visitors with a weird stick13ImbellaFolbfolksHippie14HalthawnGuardsCarl's Loyalest Soldier15LardenAmidonian TemplarsScoutTemplar Scout, and frequent companion of Alenfar, Larden is perceptive and generally no-nonsense.16MatthewAmidonian TemplarsGrunt17JakelEscapeesDead18Nate AsherCastle StaffSecretaryLongtime friend of the Governor, Nate is a competent secretary with a penchant for bad joke and worse fiction.19LeatanFolbfolksHippie20MarcusCultistsCult Leader21SanderkMerchantsTrader22SeastikGuardsDrunkardEx pirate captain who has racked up massive debts to unreputable lenders. He is best known for his drinking problems, his hatred of anyone who gets inbetween him and destroying his liver further, taking the first set of player characters to the island, and drinking. Dislikes authority, especially the Governor, who evicted him from his original shack23SeaserpaMerchantsLeaderShrewd and dangerous, Seaserpa leads a freeport from which trader capable of running the blockade trade valuable outside goods24TheockanAmidonian InquisitionGrand InquisitorThe other Grand Inquisitor, an absolute unit by any normal measurememt except when standing next to Gutankrt. Is generally more sane than his comrade, although he acts more as a subordinate to Gutankrt than an equal, at least in public25StefanCultistsDeadGrunt26SmithHimselfWizard27ZoodGuardsDrunkard28GeriloEscapeesDeadWriter Gerilio recorded the events leading up to the destruction of voyager's end, and the process that led to Marcus establishing Falandar's Cult+1

lore-buildings/archaeology-department.ht.title: Archaeology Department
lore-buildings/archaeology-department.ht.description: HomeThe Archaeology Department is known for its purpose of Mapping & Exploration, producing Maps & Locations of Interest. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/armoury.html.title: Armoury
lore-buildings/armoury.html.description: HomeThe Armoury is known for its purpose of Secure Weapon Storage, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/bakery.html.title: Bakery
lore-buildings/bakery.html.description: HomeThe Bakery is known for its purpose of Bread (for NPCs), producing Bread. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/bowyer.html.title: Bowyer
lore-buildings/bowyer.html.description: HomeThe Bowyer is known for its purpose of Bows (for Guards), producing Bows. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/brewery.html.title: Brewery
lore-buildings/brewery.html.description: HomeThe Brewery is known for its purpose of Alcohol Production, producing Alcohol. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/butcher.html.title: Butcher
lore-buildings/butcher.html.description: HomeThe Butcher is known for its purpose of Meat Production, producing Meat. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/carpenter.html.title: Carpenter
lore-buildings/carpenter.html.description: HomeThe Carpenter is known for its purpose of Maintenance, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/castle.html.title: Castle
lore-buildings/castle.html.description: HomeThe Castle is known for its purpose of Administration, producing N/A. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/castle-kitchen.html.title: Castle Kitchen
lore-buildings/castle-kitchen.html.description: HomeThe Castle Kitchen is known for its purpose of Feeding NPCs, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/chandler.html.title: Chandler
lore-buildings/chandler.html.description: HomeThe Chandler is known for its purpose of Candle Production, producing Candles. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/church.html.title: Church
lore-buildings/church.html.description: HomeThe Church is known for its purpose of Maintaining the Ward, producing N/A. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/coal-mine.html.title: Coal Mine
lore-buildings/coal-mine.html.description: HomeThe Coal Mine is known for its purpose of Coal Extraction, producing Coal. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/copper-mine.html.title: Copper Mine
lore-buildings/copper-mine.html.description: HomeThe Copper Mine is known for its purpose of Extracting Copper, producing Copper Ore. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/docks.html.title: Docks
lore-buildings/docks.html.description: HomeThe Docks is known for its purpose of Fishing, Overseas Trade, producing Fish. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/dovecote.html.title: Dovecote
lore-buildings/dovecote.html.description: HomeThe Dovecote is known for its purpose of Birb Use, producing N/A. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/dye-workshop.html.title: Dye Workshop
lore-buildings/dye-workshop.html.description: HomeThe Dye Workshop is known for its purpose of Production of Dyes, producing Dye. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/farm.html.title: Farm
lore-buildings/farm.html.description: HomeThe Farm is known for its purpose of Food Production, producing 32 Carrots, 64 Potatoes, 64 Wheat, 16 Melons, 16 Pumpkin Seeds, Tea. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/florist.html.title: Florist
lore-buildings/florist.html.description: HomeThe Florist is known for its purpose of Flower Collection, producing Flowers. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/forrester.html.title: Forrester
lore-buildings/forrester.html.description: HomeThe Forrester is known for its purpose of Lumber Extraction, producing Logs. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/foundry.html.title: Foundry
lore-buildings/foundry.html.description: HomeThe Foundry is known for its purpose of Ore Refining, producing Ingots. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/inner-walls.html.title: Inner Walls
lore-buildings/inner-walls.html.description: HomeThe Inner Walls is known for its purpose of Securing inner Ward, producing N/A. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/paper-maker.html.description: HomeThe Paper Maker is known for its purpose of Producing Paper, producing Paper. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/rot-hut.html.title: Rot Hut
lore-buildings/rot-hut.html.description: HomeThe Rot Hut is known for its purpose of Composting Rot, producing 8 Rot > 1 Dirt / 4 Rot > 1 Bonemeal / 16 Rot > 1 Mushroom. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/sawmill.html.title: Sawmill
lore-buildings/sawmill.html.description: HomeThe Sawmill is known for its purpose of Refining Lumber, producing Wood Planks. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/stew-shop.html.description: HomeThe Stew Shop is known for its purpose of Producing Stew, producing Stew. As of now, it has been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

lore-buildings/tannery.html.description: HomeThe Tannery is known for its purpose of Producing Leather, producing Leather. As of now, it has not been built.The building holds a significant place in the lore:

npcs/alenfar.html.title: Alenfar
npcs/alenfar.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Alenfar is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian TemplarsIn short, they are a Templar LeaderHigh Templar on the Dark Isles, Alenfar oversees a wide ranging extraction operation on the Dark Isles, which has included the import of many convict labourers, including many colonists. This has made him unpopular with the Spifftopians, although his relationship with our town remains on generally amicable terms.

npcs/ashley-spirit.html.title: Ashley Spirit
npcs/ashley-spirit.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Ashley Spirit is an NPC whose allegiance is not known to usIn short, they are a Hungry Spirit

npcs/charles.html.title: Charles
npcs/charles.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Charles is an NPC aligned with the CitizensIn short, they are a

npcs/crein.html.title: Crein
npcs/crein.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Crein is an NPC aligned with the GuardsIn short, they are an Ex-slave

npcs/cunien.html.title: Cunien
npcs/cunien.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Cunien is an NPC aligned with the MerchantsIn short, they are a Common visitor The regular trader to the settlement, Cunien is a

npcs/eleon.html.title: Eleon
npcs/eleon.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Eleon is an NPC aligned with the CultistsIn short, they are a Test Subject

npcs/erine.html.title: Erine
npcs/erine.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None 💀 Dead Erine is an NPC aligned with the CultistsIn short, they were a Grunt

npcs/falandar.html.title: Falandar
npcs/falandar.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Falandar is an NPC aligned with the CultistsIn short, they are a Powerful SpritA spirt so massive and powerful that we do not fully understand its proportions.

npcs/gerilio.html.title: Gerilio
npcs/gerilio.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None 💀 Dead Gerilio is an NPC aligned with the EscapeesIn short, they were a Writer Gerilio recorded the events leading up to the destruction of voyager's end, and the process that led to Marcus establishing Falandar's Cult

npcs/gerilo.html.title: Gerilo
npcs/gerilo.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None 💀 Dead Gerilo is an NPC aligned with the EscapeesIn short, they were a Writer Gerilio recorded the events leading up to the destruction of voyager's end, and the process that led to Marcus establishing Falandar's Cult

npcs/gutankrt.html.title: Gutankrt
npcs/gutankrt.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Gutankrt is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian InquisitionIn short, they are a Grand InquisitorOne of two Grand inqusitors on the Dark Isles, Gutankrt is supernaturally strong. Generally considered offputting by the colonists, they nevertheless appear to have assisted the colony by using a considerable number of lapis blocks to seal the entrance to falandar proper. Resides in the inquisition's snowy outpost, where they delight in torture and stabbing visitors with a weird stick

npcs/halcaw.html.title: Halcaw
npcs/halcaw.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Halcaw is an NPC aligned with the FlobfolksIn short, they are a Leader

npcs/halthawn.html.title: Halthawn
npcs/halthawn.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Halthawn is an NPC aligned with the GuardsIn short, they are a Carl's Loyalest Soldier

npcs/helen.html.title: Helen
npcs/helen.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Helen is an NPC aligned with the Castle StaffIn short, they are a MaidSubject to "Amidonian Conditioning", Helen has effectively had her free will stripped and will follow orders unquestioningly. She was bought from the Merchants by Carl, and was subsequently gifted to the Governor. How she arrived on the Isles as a slave is unknown.

npcs/imbella.html.title: Imbella
npcs/imbella.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Imbella is an NPC aligned with the FolbfolksIn short, they are a Hippie

npcs/jakel.html.title: Jakel
npcs/jakel.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None 💀 Dead Jakel is an NPC aligned with the EscapeesIn short, they were a

npcs/larden.html.title: Larden
npcs/larden.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Larden is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian TemplarsIn short, they are a ScoutTemplar Scout, and frequent companion of Alenfar, Larden is perceptive and generally no-nonsense.

npcs/leatan.html.title: Leatan
npcs/leatan.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Leatan is an NPC aligned with the FolbfolksIn short, they are a Hippie

npcs/marcus.html.title: Marcus
npcs/marcus.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Marcus is an NPC aligned with the CultistsIn short, they are a Cult Leader

npcs/matthew.html.title: Matthew
npcs/matthew.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Matthew is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian TemplarsIn short, they are a Grunt

npcs/nate-asher.html.title: Nate Asher
npcs/nate-asher.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Nate Asher is an NPC aligned with the Castle StaffIn short, they are a SecretaryLongtime friend of the Governor, Nate is a competent secretary with a penchant for bad joke and worse fiction.

npcs/sanderk.html.title: Sanderk
npcs/sanderk.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Sanderk is an NPC aligned with the MerchantsIn short, they are a Trader

npcs/seaserpa.html.title: Seaserpa
npcs/seaserpa.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Seaserpa is an NPC aligned with the MerchantsIn short, they are a LeaderShrewd and dangerous, Seaserpa leads a freeport from which trader capable of running the blockade trade valuable outside goods

npcs/seastik.html.title: Seastik
npcs/seastik.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Seastik is an NPC aligned with the GuardsIn short, they are a DrunkardEx pirate captain who has racked up massive debts to unreputable lenders. He is best known for his drinking problems, his hatred of anyone who gets inbetween him and destroying his liver further, taking the first set of player characters to the island, and drinking. Dislikes authority, especially the Governor, who evicted him from his original shack

npcs/smith.html.title: Smith
npcs/smith.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Smith is an NPC aligned with the HimselfIn short, they are a Wizard

npcs/stefan.html.title: Stefan
npcs/stefan.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None 💀 Dead Stefan is an NPC aligned with the CultistsIn short, they were a Grunt

npcs/theockan.html.title: Theockan
npcs/theockan.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Theockan is an NPC aligned with the Amidonian InquisitionIn short, they are a Grand InquisitorThe other Grand Inquisitor, an absolute unit by any normal measurememt except when standing next to Gutankrt. Is generally more sane than his comrade, although he acts more as a subordinate to Gutankrt than an equal, at least in public

npcs/zood.html.title: Zood
npcs/zood.html.description: Home | NPC ListInfobox None Unknown Zood is an NPC aligned with the GuardsIn short, they are a Drunkard

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. Multiple values will be tried in order until one succeeds. Multiple values will not insert this feature multiple times.

info_includePath.description: The path on the server from which this feature can be loaded

info_showDefaultFolderIcons.description: Show a default icon of a folder for every folder in the tree

info_showDefaultFileIcons.description: Show a default icon of a file for every file in the tree

info_defaultFolderIcon.description: The icon to use for folders. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultFileIcon.description: The icon to use for files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultMediaIcon.description: The icon to use for media files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_exposeStartingPath.description: Whether or not to show the current file in the file tree when the page is first loaded

info_minCollapseDepth.description: The minimum depth at which headings should be collapsed

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. Multiple values will be tried in order until one succeeds. Multiple values will not insert this feature multiple times.

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the closer connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make the graph appear more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. Multiple values will be tried in order until one succeeds. Multiple values will not insert this feature multiple times.

info_includePath.description: The path on the server from which this feature can be loaded

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded
